physical_examinations.relevant_findings: 2-week-old girl with a large 6 x 34.5 cm dark-brown CMN extending from the left nasal root to the left preauricular region and left eyebrow, encompassing the upper and lower left eyelids.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At 5 weeks of age, the CMN showed no change while an IH diagnosed at 2.5 weeks evolved into an 11 x 310.5 cm soft-tissue mass.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: 8-month-old girl with a 2.0 x 31.3 cm superficial hemangioma on the left cheek touching a 1-cm light- to dark-brown CMN.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The hemangiomas increased in size over the next several months.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: 3 x 3 cm deep-red ulcerated IH on right buttock with a 1.5 x 3 cm ulcer; 8 x 34 mm small black congenital nevus in left inguinal region.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The IH started as a red macule at 2 weeks of age and became raised by 4 months.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Medium CMN and IH on the upper left arm; CMN noted to be slowly enlarging and IH fading in color.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The IH is decreasing in size while the CMN is growing more hair.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Large dark-brown giant CMN on mid to lower back with 5-10 satellite nevi; segmental IH in beard distribution with some early ulceration.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The segmental IH was diagnosed with ulceration appearing on the lower lip.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: 11 x 3 cm CMN on left parietal scalp with 10 satellite nevi and 6 IH of various sizes.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The satellite nevi were reported to be unchanged since birth.
